content: the crochet beach girl gnome pattern is the latest addition to our gnome collection perfect for summer party decor to bring some fun and joy crochet yourself an adorable summer gnome and why not add a few more to the pool party > > the free pattern is available here 1 in the pdf crochet pattern you will find step-by-step instructions on how to crochet a summer gnome and photo tutorials to guide you through the pattern the pattern is beginner-friendly you can pair your beach gnome with these summer gnomes as well 1 the cupcake gnome pattern- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cupcake-gnome-4 2 the watermelon gnome pattern - https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/watermelon-gnome-4 3 ice cream gnome pattern with a floaty- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ice-cream-gnome-2 the listing is for the crochet pattern not an actual toy the pattern is written in english with us crochet terms materials - sport/ fine or dk weight yarn - b hook or 2 5mm hook - polyfiber fill for stuffing - a keychain ring optional if you want your gnome to be the same size as mine and can t find the same yarn i suggest you use a dk double knit weight yarn with a 2 25mm or 2 5mm crochet hook 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/beach-gnome-crochet-pattern-free/
